title: A US Sustainable Aviation Fuel Startup Takes Aim At Fossil Fuels
description:
The US startup Syzygy Plasmonics is on track to scale up sustainable aviation fuel produced from waste gas in a reactor powered by light, not heat.

The post A US Sustainable Aviation Fuel Startup Takes Aim At Fossil Fuels appeared first on CleanTechnica.
